text: Skazhitʹ: «My uviruvaly v Allaha i u te, shcho zislano nam, i shcho zislano Ibrahimu, Ismayilyu, Iskhaku, Yakubu ta kolinam iz nashchadkiv yikhnikh; u te, shcho bulo dano Musi, Ici, u te, shcho bulo dano prorokam vid Hospoda yikhnʹoho. My ne provodymo mezhi mizh nymy, i Yomu My pidkoryayemosya
